授業目的: This is a course to learn instrumentation. The purpose of this course is to understand principles and mechanisms of optical analytical instruments. Students learn optics and instrumentation of laser, microscope, spectrometer and optical devices. They also have sense on cost of instruments to make a research plan.
到達目標: Students learn how to select the suitable optical devices and to make a plan for developing instrument to conduct biological and medical researches.
授業方法: The basic knowledge is provided by lectures. Students have plesentation and discussion on problem solving exercises. The lecture is held in English and partly Japanese as well.

第1回:
Basic optics
Snell's law and refraction of light
第2回:
Optical devices
Lens, grating, mirror, filter, detector and other devices
第3回:
Light source (1)
Black-body emission. Lamp and their spectral property.
第5回:
Microscope
Selection of lenses and its property
第7回:
Spectroscopy(1)
Molecular energy level and its interaction with photon
第10回: Optical instruments for life: LCD projector etc.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students must prepare for presentation and discussion in the problem solving exercise.
